moves.21. gxf4 Bd4+ 22. Kh1 Bxc3: ? Black needs this Bishop. Necessary is 22..f5 23 e5 Bxd5  24 Nxd5 Qxd5 25 Bg2 Qc7 26 Bxa8 Rxa8 with some compensation for the echange
moves.23. bxc3 f5: Black must attack the massive white centre.
moves.24. c4: Of course white must protect d5.
moves.24... fxe4 25. Qg4: ! 25 Be6  would not be very clear.
moves.25... Bc8: The only move. If for example ....Rad8 then Qe6  wins.
moves.26. Bb2: ! The point. If now 26...Ne5 27 Qxc8!! Raxc8 28 fxe5 and white's passed pawns will be unstoppable.
moves.29... Nc6 30. fxg6+ Kg8 31. Rxf8+ Kxf8 3: If 33...Bb7 39 e7! Nxe7 40 Be6  Rh7 41 Rf7 wins
moves.34... Bxh3 35. Rf8+ Kxg7 36. Rxa8 Bd7 37: Black could easily have resigned here but continues for the sake of his team.
